channel.title: Basic Config on Shieldfy Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Basic Config on Shieldfy Documentation

item.title: Laravel Framework
item.description: Publish Config Go to your console and run vendor:publish artisan command php artisan vendor:publish --provider="Shieldfy\Extensions\Laravel\ShieldfyServiceProvider" --tag="config" now you will find a new file called shieldfy.php in your config directory Debug level
